I don't know anything about javablackbelt.com, but I
hope you're not going =
to charge anyone money to take
that test as it's currently written!  It tes=
ts knowledge 
of things that aren't JUnit, inadequately tests things
are AR=
E JUnit, and considers opinions as facts.  Plus,
many of the questions are =
posed in such weak English
that they are ambiguous and confusing.  Or maybe=
 to be
a "Java Black Belt" you must surpass such trivia.


Todd.
